name: PRE_AR_AUTH_USER
description: This table extracts the user that was responsible for the last authorization assignment.

columns.name: TAR_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the charge session record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: AUTH_OVERRIDE_USER_ID
columns.description: This column contains the user who was responsible for assigning the authorization record to the charge. If the system defaulted in the authorization record, this column will be blank.

columns.name: AUTH_OVERRIDE_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
